Place Legend on Top with Horizontal Layout

Source: R/legend_position.R
legend_top.Rd

A one-liner to position the legend above the plot with horizontal layout. Optionally aligns to the full plot area (including title) rather than just the panel.

Usage

legend_top(align_to = c("panel", "plot"))

Arguments

align_to

Where to align the legend. Either "panel" (default, aligns to plot panel) or "plot" (aligns to full plot including title). Requires ggplot2 >= 3.5.0 for "plot" alignment.

Value

A ggplot2 theme object that can be added to a plot.

See also

legend_bottom, legend_left, legend_right, legend_horizontal

Examples

library(ggplot2)

# Basic usage - aligned to panel
ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point() +
  legend_top()

# Aligned to full plot (useful with titles)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "My Plot Title") +
  legend_top(align_to = "plot")
